text: lha license permission is given for redistribution copy and modification provided following conditions are met
the content of redistribution ie source code documentation and reference guide for programmers shall include original contents
if contents are modified the document clearly indicating the fact of modification must be included
if lha is redistributed with added values you must put your best effort to include them translator comment if read literally original japanese was unclear what them means here

but undoubtedly this them means source code for the added value portion and this is a typical japanese sloppy writing style to abbreviate as such also the document clearly indicating that added value was added must be included
c binary only distribution is not allowed including added value ones
you need to put effort to distribute the latest version this is not your duty
please notify me by e mail or other means prior to the distribution if distribution is done through non internet media magazine cdrom etc
any damage caused by the existence and use of this program will not be compensated
author will not be responsible to correct errors even if program is defective
this program either as a part of this or as a whole of this may be included into other programs
in this case that program is not lha and can not call itself lha
for commercial use in addition to above conditions following condition needs to be met
the program whose content is mainly this program can not be used commercially
if the recipient of commercial use deems inappropriate as a program user you must not distribute
c if used as a method for the installation you must not force others to use this program
in this case commercial user will perform its work while taking full responsibility of its outcome
d if added value is done under the commercial use by using this program commercial user shall provide its support
osamu aoki also comments here commercial may be interpreted as for fee

translated license statement by tsugio okamoto translated by goto masanori <gotom@debianorg> its free to distribute on the network but if you distribute for the people who cannot access the network by magazine or cd rom please send e mail inter net address to the author before the distribution
